room_title: Escape room "Inventor's Workshop" by The Greatest Escape Games in Colorado Springs
room_address: 801 South Tejon Street Colorado Springs, CO 80903
room_description:
You have been contacted by attorney Reginald Clearwater.

Your Uncle Richard Worthington, an eccentric inventor has passed away. However, he wanted you to continue his work. He didn’t want his years of work and creations to fall into the wrongs hands. But in order to do so, you must find his will before the bank arrives to seize control.
You and your friends must work together to solve his puzzles to find his will. Worthington was curious man with a wild imagination, so you’ll find many peculiar items in his home!
